docs.title: TinySHM: Distributed Intelligence Enabling Framework for Structural Health Monitoring
ABOUT THIS PROJECT
docs.text:
This project aims to develop an empowering framework that equips MCU-level IoT devices with distributed computing and intelligence capabilities to facilitate structural health monitoring applications. If you think this project is interesting, please give it a star and stay tuned.

TinySHM

"TinySHM" is a combination of "Tiny" and "SHM". "Tiny" means the codes are designed to run on MCU devices, while "SHM" stands for "Structural Health Monitoring".

docs.title: TARGET HARDWARE
docs.text: • MCU devices (ESP32 as the main target)

docs.title: SCOPE
docs.text:
• Basic Math Operations
  • Digital Signal Processing
  • TinyML / Edge AI
  • Measurement
  • System Identification
  • Damage Monitoring, Localization, and Assessment

docs.title: TinySHM: Distributed Intelligence Enabling Framework for Structural Health Monitoring
ABOUT THIS PROJECT
docs.text:
This project aims to develop an empowering framework that equips MCU-level IoT devices with distributed computing and intelligence capabilities to facilitate structural health monitoring applications. If you think this project is interesting, please give it a star and stay tuned.

TinySHM

"TinySHM" is a combination of "Tiny" and "SHM". "Tiny" means the codes are designed to run on MCU devices, while "SHM" stands for "Structural Health Monitoring".

docs.title: TARGET HARDWARE
docs.text: • MCU devices (ESP32 as the main target)

docs.title: SCOPE
docs.text:
• Basic Math Operations
  • Digital Signal Processing
  • TinyML / Edge AI
  • Measurement
  • System Identification
  • Damage Monitoring, Localization, and Assessment

docs.title: ADAPTATION
docs.text:
ADAPTATION

The adaptation layer serves as a buffer layer between the MCU platform and TinySHM. Its core function is to decouple the platform-specific components from the computational and intelligent components in TinySHM, facilitating cross-platform migration and application of TinySHM.

Warning

Currently, development is based on ESP32, and migration to platforms like STM32 will require some modifications to the adaptation layer.

docs.title: SUPPORT FOR ESP32 OFFICIAL LIBS
docs.text:
• ESP-DSP

    Online Doc

  • ESP-DL

    Online Doc

docs.title: LAYERED ARCHITECTURE
docs.text:
+------------------------------+
| AI                           | <-- AI/ML Functions for Edge Devices based on Low Level Functions
+------------------------------+
| DSP                          | <-- Digital Signal Processing Functions
+------------------------------+
| Math Operations              | <-- Commonly Used Math Functions for Various Applications
+------------------------------+
| Adaptation Layer             | <-- To Replace Functions in Standard C with Platform Optimized/Specific Functions
+------------------------------+

docs.title: CODE ORGANIZATION
docs.text:
+------------------------------+
| APPLICATION                  |
|   - measurement              | <-- measurement / sensing
|   - system_identification    | <-- system identification
|   - damage detection         | <-- damage detection, localization, and assessment
+------------------------------+
| MIDDLEWARE                   |
|   - TinyAdapter              | <-- Platform-specific Low-level Optimization
|   - TinyMath                 | <-- Common Math Functions
|   - TinyDSP                  | <-- DSP Functions
|   - TinyAI                   | <-- AI Functions
+------------------------------+
| DRIVERS                      |
+------------------------------+
| HARDWARE                     |
+------------------------------+

docs.title: TinySHM：用于结构健康监测的分布式智能框架
关于本项目
docs.text:
该项目旨在开发一个赋能框架，使MCU级别的物联网设备具备分布式计算和智能能力，从而提升结构健康监测应用的效果。如果你对这个项目感兴趣，请给个星并保持关注。

TinySHM

"TinySHM" 是 "Tiny" 和 "SHM" 的组合。"Tiny" 意味着代码被设计为运行在 MCU 设备上，而 "SHM" 是 "Structural Health Monitoring" 的缩写。

docs.title: 目标硬件
docs.text: • MCU 设备（以 ESP32 为主要目标）

docs.title: 范围
docs.text:
• 基本数学运算
  • 数字信号处理
  • TinyML / 边缘人工智能
  • 测量
  • 系统识别
  • 损伤监测、定位、评估

docs.title: TinySHM：用于结构健康监测的分布式智能框架
TinySHM：用于结构健康监测的分布式智能框架
关于本项目
docs.text:
该项目旨在开发一个赋能框架，使MCU级别的物联网设备具备分布式计算和智能能力，从而提升结构健康监测应用的效果。如果你对这个项目感兴趣，请给个星并保持关注。

TinySHM

"TinySHM" 是 "Tiny" 和 "SHM" 的组合。"Tiny" 意味着代码被设计为运行在 MCU 设备上，而 "SHM" 是 "Structural Health Monitoring" 的缩写。

docs.title: 目标硬件
docs.text: • MCU 设备（以 ESP32 为主要目标）

docs.title: 范围
docs.text:
• 基本数学运算
  • 数字信号处理
  • TinyML / 边缘人工智能
  • 测量
  • 系统识别
  • 损伤监测、定位、评估

docs.title: 适配
docs.text:
关于适配层

适配层是一个介于MCU平台与TinySHM之间的缓冲层，其核心作用是将平台特有的部分与TinySHM中关于计算与智能的部分进行解耦，从而方便TinySHM的跨平台移植与应用。

Warning

目前开发以ESP32为基础，向STM32等平台的迁移需要对适配层进行一定的修改。

docs.text:
• ESP-DSP

docs.title: 代码组织
docs.text:
+------------------------------+
| 应用层                        |
|   - measurement              | <-- 测量
|   - system_identification    | <-- 系统识别
|   - damage detection         | <-- 损伤检测,定位和评估
+------------------------------+
| 中间件                        |
|   - TinyAdapter              | <-- 平台底层优化
|   - TinyMath                 | <-- 常用数学函数
|   - TinyDSP                  | <-- DSP 函数
|   - TinyAI                   | <-- AI 函数
+------------------------------+
| 驱动层                        |
+------------------------------+
| 硬件层                        |
+------------------------------+
